languages.text: "Я не был осведомлен, насколько популярно учение благословенного Амарната в кругах Эксплораторов. Флот Осознание масштабен, на его периферии его идеи могли обладать большим числом сторонников, чем в материнской эскадре".

"I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."
languages.original_text: "Я не был осведомлен, насколько популярно учение благословенного Амарната в кругах Эксплораторов. Флот Осознание масштабен, на его периферии его идеи могли обладать большим числом сторонников, чем в материнской эскадре".

traits.locale_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive; in its periphery, his ideas might have found a larger following than in the mother squadron."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive; in its periphery, his ideas might have found a larger following than in the mother squadron."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我之前并不了解蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义在开拓者的圈子中有多么受欢迎。真理开拓者舰队规模庞大，或许与母舰舰队相比，他的思想在分支舰队中吸引到了更多追随者。”
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: “我之前并不了解蒙福者阿玛纳特的教义在开拓者的圈子中有多么受欢迎。真理开拓者舰队规模庞大，或许与母舰舰队相比，他的思想在分支舰队中吸引到了更多追随者。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «No sabía lo populares que eran las enseñanzas del bendito Amarnat en los círculos de exploradores. La Flota de Conocimiento es inmensa: sus ideas podrían haber calado más en la periferia que en el escuadrón central».
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: «No sabía lo populares que eran las enseñanzas del bendito Amarnat en los círculos de exploradores. La Flota de Conocimiento es inmensa: sus ideas podrían haber calado más en la periferia que en el escuadrón central».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アマルナトの教えが探検艦隊でどれほど人気があったのか、私は知らなかった。コグニサンス艦隊は巨大だ。彼の考えは、母艦隊よりもその周辺部に多くの支持者を持っていた可能性はある」
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトの教えが探検艦隊でどれほど人気があったのか、私は知らなかった。コグニサンス艦隊は巨大だ。彼の考えは、母艦隊よりもその周辺部に多くの支持者を持っていた可能性はある」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wusste nicht, wie beliebt die Lehre des gesegneten Amarnat in Explorator-Kreisen war. Die Erkenntnisflotte ist gewaltig — seine Philosophie hätten in ihrem Umfeld vielleicht mehr Anhänger gefunden als im Muttergeschwader."
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wusste nicht, wie beliebt die Lehre des gesegneten Amarnat in Explorator-Kreisen war. Die Erkenntnisflotte ist gewaltig — seine Philosophie hätten in ihrem Umfeld vielleicht mehr Anhänger gefunden als im Muttergeschwader."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne savais pas à quel point les enseignements sacrés d'Amarnat étaient populaires dans les cercles des explorators. La Flotte de la Connaissance est immense ; ses idées auront peut-être trouvé encore plus d'adeptes à sa périphérie que dans l'escadron principal. »
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne savais pas à quel point les enseignements sacrés d'Amarnat étaient populaires dans les cercles des explorators. La Flotte de la Connaissance est immense ; ses idées auront peut-être trouvé encore plus d'adeptes à sa périphérie que dans l'escadron principal. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

languages.text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın öğretilerinin Keşiftör çevrelerinde böylesine popüler olduğuna dair bilgi sahibi değildim. Malumat Filosu devasadır. Fikirleri, ana eskadradan ziyade dış kısımlarda destekçi bulmuş olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I was not knowledgeable as to how popular blessed Amarnat's teaching was in Explorator circles. The Cognisance Fleet is massive — his ideas might have found a larger following on its periphery than in the mother squadron."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış Amarnat'ın öğretilerinin Keşiftör çevrelerinde böylesine popüler olduğuna dair bilgili değildim. Malumat Filosu devasadır. Fikirleri, ana eskadradan daha çok dış kısımlarda kendisine takipçi bulmuş olabilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
